title: Here’s What You Have to Do If You Want a Selfie with Justin Bieber - Video
text: If you’re a Belieber, the first thing you have to remember if you ever see your idol, Justin Bieber, is that he doesn’t like screaming girls fans. He also doesn’t like being pressured into taking selfies with the fans, saying in a new video that an open request for a photo would do a better job at convincing him. Because wherever he goes chaos ensues, Justin went through the trouble of putting together a SnapChat video (see below), in which he lays out some ground r... »
